name: SHREK SIMULATOR 2018
description:
Donkey has invaded Shrek swamp and now Shrek has to scare him away! Help Shrek regain his swamp!

Controls:

-Move the mouse to control Shrek

-Left Mouse: click on Donkey to scare him away

if you ask how this game was made i would gladly say i smoked 3 tons of weed

a trash game indeed
